page.title: 15EDUCATION
page.content: Buxted School Organisation. Buxted school is now a four class school wwith a teaching compliment of 4.6 teachers including the head. The head teaches 5 tenths of the week. The classes are arranged according to age and not according to ability. The teaching is such that we try to cater for the needs of the child at any particular time. There is some group work, a little class teaching to the older children, but children tend to work individually.Mornings are devoted to the more formal work and the basic work in English and Maths.Afternoons are spent on project work and art work.Children use the school outdoor pool during the Summer and Autumn terms.We paly football, netball, hockey, athletics, squash. The children learn the recorder.
